price: Onlar: "Endişelenme, biz sana bilgin bir erkek evlat müjdeliyoruz." dediler.
arabic: قَالُواْ لَا تَوۡجَلۡ إِنَّا نُبَشِّرُكَ بِغُلَٰمٍ عَلِيمٖ

version.title: Turkish translation - Rowwad Tanslation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com in 1440 H.

meta.transliteration: qālū lā tawjal innā nubashiruka bighulāmin ʿalīmin
